attributes.action: order the National Institute for Clinical Excellence to publish full details of which drugs they do approve for funding, and which they do not, with explanations for each
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm sure I can't be the only person who is appalled to read, so often, about not-so-N.I.C.E. refusing funding for life-saving drugs, such as those for cancer, or life-enhancing ones such as those for Alzheimer's and, currently, age-related wet maculation.  Since there is, apparently, no way to appeal against these decisions the least we can expect is to be told how they are arrived at.
